front.title: IP Multicast Requirements for a Network Address (and port) Translator (NAT)

abstract.t: This document specifies requirements for a Network Address (and port) Translator (NAT) that supports any source IP multicast or source specific IP multicast. An IP multicast-capable NAT device that adheres to the requirements of this document can optimize the operation of IP multicast applications that are generally unaware of IP multicast NAT devices.
